subject: adobe creative suite premium $269
body:
The man who suspects his own tediousness is yet to be born.
The mere brute pleasure of reading --the sort of pleasure a cow must have in grazing.
Any change, even for the better, is always accompanied by drawbacks and discomforts.
If thou wouldn't conquer thy weakness thou must not gratify it.
Government proposes, bureaucracy disposes. And the bureaucracy must dispose of government proposals by dumping them on us.
Ignorant men don't know what good they hold in their hands until they've flung it away.
Art is the symbol of the two noblest human efforts: to construct and to refrain from destruction.
Art is the human disposition of sensible or intelligible matter for an esthetic end.
A man may fulfill the object of his existence by asking a question he cannot answer, and attempting a task he cannot achieve.
To keep a lamp burning we have to keep putting oil in it.
By night an atheist half believes in God.
There are only 3 colors, 10 digits, and 7 notes its what we do with them that's important.
Nature, time and patience are the three great physicians.
The more sand has escaped from the hourglass of our life, the clearer we should see through it.
Whenever books are burned men also in the end are burned.
Let us not be ashamed to speak what we shame not to think.
Irresponsibility is part of the pleasure of all art it is the part the schools cannot recognize.
You can hype a questionable product for a little while, but you'll never build an enduring business.
Sometimes the answer to prayer is not that it changes life, but that it changes you.
